alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 23 at 3:57PM AKST until December 25 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 40 to 55 mph with gusts to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills. * WHEN...From 6 AM Friday to 6 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down power lines. Widespread power outages may occur. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds have decreased some today, but are expected to become strong again by early Saturday and remain strong into Sunday.
info.instruction: If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
